comments:
When one of our testers uses our product based off of WTP 1.0.2 200604200208,
the following NPE occurs when they attempt to publish their EAR to a server:

ava.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.wst.web.internal.deployables.ComponentDeployable.getMembers(ComponentD
eployable.java:163)
at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.deployables.J2EEFlexProjDeployable.getConsumableRefe
rencedMembers(J2EEFlexProjDeployable.java:380)
at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.deployables.J2EEFlexProjDeployable.members(J2EEFlexP
rojDeployable.java:145)

Since the testcase is too large to attach here, I will send it to Chuck Bridgham.

Added the safeguard for noncosumable components in the getConsumableReferencedComponents method.

Released for WTP 1.5 RC2 042906.
